messages.subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics] Digest Number 31
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 6/11/2004 6:25:23 PM Central Standard Time, unschoolingbasics@yahoogroups.com writes: Montana has no requirements other than that you have
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 6/11/2004 6:25:23 PM Central Standard Time,
unschoolingbasics@yahoogroups.com writes:
Montana has no requirements other than that you have to write to your county
superintendent and state that you plan to homeschool your child(ren) for that
particular year.
***

Same here in Louisiana...you just have to send in a standard form stating
that you are a private school :)

Hi there you guys, I'm planning on sending in an intro when I get a minute!
Sure am enjoying reading the digests. I've been lurking on several
unschooling lists for a couple of years. Heard about this one and signed up AND it's a
KEEPER : )

Warmly,
Denise near New Orleans


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
